ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: Timepoint/visit label
Have you ever had a heart attack?
Have you ever been treated for heart failure? (the doctor may have told you that you had fluid in your lungs or that your heart was not pumping well)
Charlson Comorbidity: had operation to unclog or bypass arteries in legs
Have you ever had problems with bleeding or blood clots?
Charlson Comorbidity: have emphysema, chronic bronchitis, or chronic obstructive lung disease (also called COPD)
Charlson Comorbidity: have asthma
Charlson Comorbidity: had stroke, cerebrovascular accident, blood clot or bleeding in brain, or transient ischemic attack (TIA)
Charlson Comorbidity: have difficulty moving arm or leg as result of stroke or cerebrovascular accident
Do you have Alzheimer's disease or another form of dementia?
Charlson Comorbidity: have diabetes (high blood sugar)
Has the diabetes caused problems with your kidneys, eyes, or skin?
Have you ever had problems with your kidneys (high creatinine, dialysis, transplant)?
Charlson Comorbidity: have stomach ulcers or peptic ulcer disease
Do you have acute viral hepatitis, cholestasis or a disorder of the gallbladder or bile duct?
Do you have chronic hepatitis, cirrhosis, or serious liver damage?
Have you ever had leukemia or polycythemia vera?
Have you ever been diagnosed with Lymphoma?
Do you have cancer (non-metastasized), other than skin cancer, leukemia, or lymphoma?
Do you have metastasized cancer of any kind?
Do you have AIDS/HIV?
Do you have rheumatoid arthritis or lupus?
Charleson Comorbidity Index (weighted sum)
